AI Description: Numba is a just-in-time compiler for Python that works best on code that uses NumPy arrays and functions. It compiles Python functions to machine code at runtime using the industry-standard LLVM compiler library. It is designed to be used with NumPy arrays and functions, and integrates seamlessly with the Python scientific software stack.
Core Features: Just-In-Time Compilation Of Python Code, Optimized Performance Of Numerical Computations, Integration With Numpy Arrays & Functions, Uses Llvm Compiler Library For Machine Code Generation
General Tags: Software Compiler, Python Library, Numeric Computation, Scientific Computing
